entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 12:00 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -2.6°C

Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -5.5°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 2.
